actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish model projects concerning the effect of substance abuse on pregnant females, postpartum females and infants, and for other purposes.
short_title: Child Abuse During Pregnancy Prevention Act of 1989
subjects: Federal aid to maternal health services
Treatment and rehabilitation of narcotic addicts

summary.text: Child Abuse During Pregnancy Prevention Act of 1989 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services, through the Director of the Office of Substance Abuse, to award grants to States to develop and operate five pilot projects to demonstrate the effectiveness of, and expense associated with, providing outreach, education, and treatment services concerning substance abuse to pregnant and postpartum females and their infants. Sets forth application and evaluation requirements. Directs the Secretary to conduct a study regarding specified aspects of substance abused infants and to report to the appropriate committees of the Congress. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1990.

titles.title: Child Abuse During Pregnancy Prevention Act of 1989
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish model projects concerning the effect of substance abuse on pregnant females, postpartum females and infants, and for other purposes.
